## Description
A clear description of the feature or improvement.

## Problem It Solves
What problem or limitation does this address?

## Proposed Solution
How should this work? Any specific API changes or UX improvements?

## Example Use Case
Describe a real-world scenario where this feature would be useful.

## Alternatives Considered
Other ways this could be implemented?

## Additional Context
Any other context, mockups, or references?
